p: Phenolic acids present in aqueous (80%) methanol extracts of the different plant parts were identified and quantified using Ultra-high performance liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (UHPLC-MS/MS) as previously described [ 58]. The assay was done in triplicate and results presented as mean ± standard error. The mean values obtained were compared using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) and where statistical significance ( p ≤ 0.05) existed, these values were further separated using the Duncan’s multiple range test. Bio-statistical analysis were done using the SPSS version 24.0 for Windows (IBM SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA).
